mp_rl.core

mp_rl.core#

The mp_rl.core module contains the multiprocessing reinforcement learning algorithm implementation and the functionalities for auto-checkpointing and network loading. Its main interface is the core.ddpg class which implements the training process and constructs the required core.actor, core.critic, core.normalizer and core.replay_buffer.
